lead_paragraph: DragonBack Capital, a hedge fund based in Hong Kong that managed as much as $600 million at its peak, has held talks with more than 30 managers to provide support services as it seeks other business after closing its funds, the chief executive, Rob Lance, has told Bloomberg News.
snippet: DragonBack Capital, a Hong Kong- based hedge-fund firm which managed as much as $600 million at its peak, has held talks with more than 30 managers to provide support services as it seeks other business after closing its hedge funds, said chief...

headline.main: DragonBack Aims to Offer Services to Hedge Funds

abstract: DragonBack Capital, a Hong Kong- based hedge-fund firm which managed as much as $600 million at its peak, has held talks with more than 30 managers to provide support services as it seeks other business after closing its hedge funds, said chief executive Rob Lance, Bloomberg News reported.
